titleStmt.title: A table gathered ouut of a booke named A treatise of treasons against Q. Elizabeth, and the croune of England latelie compiled by a stranger and sent owt of France ...
titleStmt.author: Leslie, John, 1527-1596.
G. T.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and publisher suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
